org.jikesrvm.objectmodel.BootImageInterface

  • Packages that use BootImageInterface 
    Package Description
    org.jikesrvm.mm.mminterface  
    org.jikesrvm.objectmodel  

    • Uses of BootImageInterface in org.jikesrvm.mm.mminterface

      Methods in org.jikesrvm.mm.mminterface with parameters of type BootImageInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void MemoryManager.initializeHeader(BootImageInterface bootImage, Address ref, TIB tib, int size, boolean isScalar)
      Override the boot-time initialization method here, so that the core MMTk code doesn't need to know about the BootImageInterface type.

      Fills an alignment gap with the alignment value
